question: Golden Arrows, that was seen in news, is the squadron of which Armed Force of India?
explanation:
The new Rafale Jets are to be inducted into the part of the Indian Air Forceâ€™s 17 Squadron also known as the Golden Arrows.
IAF is to formally induct the Rafale fighters at the Ambala air base on September 10 in presence of Union Defence minister Rajnath Singh. India has also invited French Defence Minister, Florence Parly, to attend the ceremony.
